name: Clinic
description: 3rd Street Youth Center & Clinic provides youth (aged 12 to 24 years old) with free primary, physical, and sexual healthcare, including the following: - Condoms and birth control (all methods) - HIV/STD testing, counseling, and/or treatment - Pap smears and pelvic exams - Pregnancy testing and counseling - Physicals for sports or school by appointment - Sick care for routine illnesses - For a full list of services, visit https://3rdstyouth.org/clinic/. Eligibility: - Enrollment in Medi-Cal or He
